blogPost.excerpt: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse is a collection of essential features that help your Clubhouse rooms standout amongst the rest. Visualize your ideas by drawing on the Whiteboard, while engaging listeners with Q&As and Polls.
blogPost.body: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse is a collection of essential features that help your Clubhouse rooms standout amongst the rest. Visualize your ideas by drawing on the Whiteboard, while engaging listeners with Q&As and Polls.
blogPost.title: Whiteboard, Q&A, and Polls for Clubhouse - Supercharge your clubhouse room and differentiate your talk
blogPost.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré

localize.description: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse 是一个基本功能的集合，它能帮助您的Clubhouse房间在其他房间中脱颖而出。通过在白板上画画来实现您的想法，同时通过问答和民意调查来吸引听众。
localize.tagline: 超强的会所房，差异化的谈资。

localize.description: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse 是一個基本功能的集合，它能幫助您的Clubhouse房間在其他房間中脫穎而出。通過在白板上畫畫來實現您的想法，同時通過問答和民意調查來吸引聽衆。
localize.tagline: 超強的會所房，差異化的談資。

previous.excerpt: Enter Vibe City and cruise through a regularly updated selection of chill music ✌🏼 -- Website: https://www.vibecity.fm
previous.title: Vibe City FM - Non-stop & regularly updated selection of chill music

localize.description: 进入Vibe City，通过定期更新的冷酷音乐选择进行巡游✌🏼--网站：https://www.vibecity.fm。
localize.tagline: 不间断和定期更新的冷门音乐选择。

localize.description: 進入Vibe City，通過定期更新的冷酷音樂選擇進行巡遊✌🏼--網站：https://www.vibecity.fm。
localize.tagline: 不間斷和定期更新的冷門音樂選擇。

next.excerpt: InstaText is a user-friendly writing and editing tool that helps you improve your text so that you are understood and perceived as a professional. InstaText improves styling and word choice, corrects grammatical errors and enriches your content.
next.title: InstaText - AI-based editing tool that helps you improve your text

localize.description: InstaText是一个用户友好的写作和编辑工具，它可以帮助您改进您的文本，以便您被理解并被视为专业。InstaText可以改善文体和选词，纠正语法错误，丰富您的内容。
localize.tagline: 基于人工智能的编辑工具，帮助你提高文字水平。

localize.description: InstaText是一個用戶友好的寫作和編輯工具，它可以幫助您改進您的文本，以便您被理解並被視爲專業。InstaText可以改善文體和選詞，糾正語法錯誤，豐富您的內容。
localize.tagline: 基於人工智能的編輯工具，幫助你提高文字水平。
